long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A tool for sourcing candidates on LinkedIn
Finding top talent has never been easier with the Tscout Chrome Extension, designed to simplify the sourcing process for freelance recruiters. Whether you're browsing LinkedIn or any other candidate platform, this powerful tool allows you to seamlessly discover, save, and manage potential candidates directly to your Tscout dashboard.

Key features:
One-click candidate save: Quickly save candidate profiles from LinkedIn with just one click. No more manual data entry or switching between tabs—gather all essential information instantly.
Profile enrichment: Automatically extract key candidate details, including name, current job title, company, and LinkedIn URL. Tscout enriches this data, providing a comprehensive candidate profile ready for evaluation.
Organized talent pool: Keep your candidates organized in a centralized database. With the extension, you can categorize and tag profiles, making it easier to revisit and shortlist candidates for your open positions.
Seamless integration with Tscout: Effortlessly sync your saved candidates to the Tscout platform. Review profiles, add notes, and submit candidates to open job requisitions without ever leaving your browser.

Benefits for freelance recruiters:
Time-saving: Reduce the manual process of copy-pasting information. The extension captures candidate data directly from LinkedIn, allowing you to focus more on outreach and engagement.
Enhanced efficiency: Quickly build your candidate pipeline by sourcing profiles directly into Tscout, streamlining the recruitment workflow.
Better candidate management: Keep track of every candidate you’ve sourced in one place, with easy access and the ability to update profiles as needed.

How it works:
Install the Tscout Chrome Extension and pin it to your browser for quick access.
Log in to your Tscout account.
While browsing LinkedIn, click the Tscout icon to save candidate profiles instantly.
View and manage saved candidates on Tscout, and submit profiles to job openings in a few simple steps.

Download now and start sourcing smarter not harder with Tscout!

Tscout.ai services
A modern platform connecting companies with top recruiters and engineers
Helping companies to find and vet top candidates more efficiently than traditional recruitment agencies.
Our core services:
Headhunting service
Connect with top-tier candidates tailored to your specific needs, especially in niche industries.
Job posting & freelance recruiter network
Standard package:
A cost-effective option allowing companies to post job listings for free. freelance recruiters from our network submit qualified candidate profiles for review.
Premium package (technical interview & assessment):
Senior developers from Tscout conduct in-depth technical interviews, provide video recordings, and generate detailed evaluation reports. Ideal for startups and companies needing specialized technical hiring support.

Learn more about Tscout
